questiontext.text:
Given the following set of functional dependencies on the attribute set \(\{ABCDE\}\):

  • \(ADCB \rightarrow D\)

  • \(AE \rightarrow B\)

  • \(E \rightarrow D\)

Which of the following are key candidates?

generalfeedback.text:
1. False, because the closure does not contain all attributes: \(\{BCE\}^+ = \{BCED\}\).
  2. False, because the closure does not contain all attributes: \(\{ADE\}^+ = \{ADEB\}\).
  3. False, because the closure does not contain all attributes: \(\{ABE\}^+ = \{ABED\}\).
  4. False, because the closure does not contain all attributes: \(\{ACB\}^+ = \{ACB\}\).
  5. False, because the closure does not contain all attributes: \(\{ACD\}^+ = \{ACD\}\).

feedback.text: False, because the closure does not contain all attributes: \(\{BCE\}^+ = \{BCED\}\).
False, because the closure does not contain all attributes: \(\{ADE\}^+ = \{ADEB\}\).
False, because the closure does not contain all attributes: \(\{ABE\}^+ = \{ABED\}\).
False, because the closure does not contain all attributes: \(\{ACB\}^+ = \{ACB\}\).
False, because the closure does not contain all attributes: \(\{ACD\}^+ = \{ACD\}\).
